definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">generation</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">generate_acid_lakes</field><field name="comment">This controls whether the Acid Lake feature generates</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Generate Acid Lakes</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">generate_banana_patches</field><field name="comment">This controls whether the Banana Patch feature generates</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Generate Banana Patches</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">permissions</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">access_existing_passwords_permission_level</field><field name="comment">This controls the permission level required for people to be able to see the existing password in the Password Changer GUI</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Password Viewing Permission Level</field><field name="value">3</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">misc</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">give_all_recipes_on_player_join</field><field name="comment">When enabled, this runs /recipe give @a * when an player joins the server or world</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Give Players All Recipes</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">allow_item_clearing</field><field name="comment">This controls whether the Clear button in the Secure Storage Block and the Delete Items button in the Netherite backpack work</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Allow Features To Delete Items</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
